title: DSLR Camera
description: This is a black Canon EOS Rebel T7 DSLR camera with the Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II kit lens attached, featuring the classic DSLR body design with mode dial, control buttons, and LCD screen on the back. The camera displays Canon's signature branding on the front pentaprism housing, has a textured grip for secure handling, and the lens shows the characteristic blue-tinted front element with zoom and focus rings visible around the barrel
